titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Queer Zines, Magazines, and Newspapers Collection
Queer Zines, Magazines, and Newspapers Collection
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 11:13

did.unittitle: Queer zines, magazines, and newspapers collection

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The Queer Zines, Magazines, and Newspaper Collection includes printed ephemera and publications documenting the development of lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, and queer communities in their own voices. Includes mass circulation and small press publications.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by the Larry Kramer Initiative Executive Coordinator, 2004-2005. Gift of Bert Hansen, 2015.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Queer Zines, Magazines, and Newspapers Collection (MS 1847). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Queer Zines, Magazines, and Newspaper Collection includes printed ephemera and publications documenting the development of lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, and queer communities in their own voices. Includes mass circulation and small press publications.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The papers are arranged in one section, Original Accession, 1948, 1974-2004, and two additions.
